title: Gorgeous 2 Bedroom Located in Desirable LoDo Neighborhood! Tour Today!
map_address: 827 Park Ave West near Park Ave and Stout Street
posting_body: Take a Video Tour Today
> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.
Affordable apartments at $700 less than nearby communities!
Submit your application paperwork quickly and easily online.
First come first serve -- apartments are going fast!
Park Avenue West is conveniently located in the popular LoDo neighborhood putting you near multiple restaurants and great shopping and entertainment options.
Our 2 bedroom apartment homes feature an in home washer and dryer, large living rooms and open and bright kitchens that are fully equipped with modern tools of the trade.
We are adding to our already amazing community in order to bring you the best of the best!
Our community renovations include a new fitness center, renovated community room and outdoor patio for residents to enjoy and hang out with family & friends.
PLUS, brand new granite countertops and appliance package in every kitchen and newly installed bathroom vanity tops and flooring!
Community Amenities Include:
- One Heated Underground Parking Garage Space Included
- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service
- Refreshed Lobby & Building Interior Corridors - COMPLETE!
- Updated Bathroom Vanity Tops & Flooring
- Open & Spacious Floor Plans
- Updated Patio with Fire Pit, Grills, Turf Area & Cornhole Games
- Fully Remodeled Management & Leasing Office - COMPLETE!
We are a pet friendly community!
Dogs & cats welcome!
See Respective Floor Plan -
Office Hours:
Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:00PM
Make the move today by giving our professional staff a call:
